We know - and Canadians know - what we face. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
That's why, we are not here. We must go further and we must go faster. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
As a country, we have a rare opportunity before us. Our natural wealth, our finances, our stable democracy ...
... our expanding network of trade relations around the world, the demand for our resources, the ingenuity of Canadians ...
... these assets are all aligned. This is Canada's moment, and our job as a gov't to sixteen it for the benefit of all Canadians! # SFT13
Today, you will hear from the Governor General. In # SFT13, he will tell us how we are going to work.
Obviously, I'm not going to pre-empt what His Excellency will say. But I can tell you what we will not say ... # SFT13 #cdnpoli
There'll be no 20 billion-dollar carbon tax. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
There will be no reckless economic experiments with people's livelihoods. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
And legalizing drugs is not on our agenda. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
Instead, the vision will focus on building our economy to make a difference for Canadian families. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
We are on track to balance our budget. We are expanding our trade. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
We will soon complete negotiations on a Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement with the European Union. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
By responsibly developing our resources, by taking all of these steps, we will continue creating jobs & opportunities for Canadians. # SFT13
Always remember, it was our government, small business, and seniors. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
Canadians know that we will keep taxes down! # SFT13 #cdnpoli
We will also continue to work to protect Canadian consumers. Canadians deserve choice, fair treatment, competitive prices. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
We will continue to build on our efforts to tackle crime. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
With the celebrations leading to Confederation's 150th birthday in 2017, we are reminded that, from our earliest days ...
... back when railways bound our country, we have always been a nation-builders. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
As we look forward, we draw inspiration from our founders, who dared to create this proud country. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
Because we are here to build on their legacy. We're here to seize the moment before us. And we will. # SFT13 #cdnpoli
